===Etymology 3===
{{lang|zh|毛}} refers to the furry appearance of mold. Compare {{cog|cmn|-}} {{zh-l|長毛|to grow mold}}.

Alternatively, {{lang|zh|毛}} may come from {{zh-l|*殕}} (''*p-'' > ''m-''). Compare {{cog|nan|-}} {{zh-l|上殕|tr=chhiūⁿ-phú|to become moldy}}.

{{lang|zh|毛}} is commonly believed to be from {{der|zh|en|mold}}, but this is unlikely.
